strings.EAMP999.alert.name: Metadata standard name is wrong
strings.EAMP999.report.name: Metadata standard name:
strings.EAMP100.alert.noformat: At least one Distribution Format must be provided
strings.EAMP200.alert.number: AfANumber is mandatory for records with the following status only: notAfaToBeAssessedWithGuidance, afaPubSchemeAndInfoForReuseReg, afaPublicRegister, afaPublicationScheme or afaInformationRequestsOnly
strings.EAMP300.alert.name: Each Point of Contact must contain one Individual Name
strings.EAMP300.alert.org: Each Point of Contact must contain one Organisation Name
strings.EAMP300.alert.position: Each Point of Contact must contain one one Position Name
strings.EAMP300.alert.role: Each Point of Contact must contain one Role
strings.EAMP300.alert.custodian: Each dataset must have exactly two points of contact with the role "Custodian"
strings.EAMP300.alert.owner: Each dataset must have exactly one point of contact with the role "Owner"
strings.EAMP300.alert.poc: Each dataset must have exactly one point of contact with the role "Point of Contact"
